body.name: Cold Steel Utility Knife (Kitchen Classics), Black, One Size
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: The Cold Steel Kitchen Classics series feature high performance ice tempered, cryo-quenched and precision flat ground 400 series steel blades for exceptional cutting performance
All models in the series come with a razor sharp edge that lasts and lasts, and some have serrated edges uniquely appropriate to the tasks they were designed to do
The set includes an attractive oak counter-top stand, one of each of the knives shown here, and 6 steak knives
The Kitchen Classics feature a newly re-designed handle to ensure a secure, yet comfortable grip
Specifications - Blade Length: 6 inches; Handle Length: 4 7/8 inches; Weight: 2.4 ounces
body.description: Our new series of kitchen knives, the Kitchen Classics, will race through just about any task you can imagine. These blades are ice tempered and then precision flat ground for maximum cutting power. All models in the series come with a razor sharp edge that lasts and lasts, and some have serrated edges uniquely appropriate to the tasks they were designed to do. The handles are, in a word, terrific! Carefully designed to ensure a strong, secure, yet comfortable grip, they feature a stiff Zy-Ex core on the inside, with a softer, deeply checkered Kray-Ex exterior for a the kind of non-slip grip that must be felt to be appreciated! The Kitchen Classics are available for purchase as single items or as a complete set. The set includes an attractive counter-top oak stand, and one of each [except for the Steak Knife, which comes in a group of 6] of the knives in the series.

Warranty Description
productInformation.value: ‎Knives & Blades: We stand behind our products 100%. We subject them to the highest standards in the industry and strive to make each as perfect as possible. We warrant that this product is free of defects in workmanship and materials. This warranty does not cover normal wear and tear, resharpening, damage caused by misuse, lack of normal maintenance, or disassembly. Remember, anything can break or fail if subject to sufficient abuse. So please do not use this product inappropriately. No knife or sword should be used as an axe, hatchet, screwdriver or prybar. Non Blades: We stand behind our products 100%. We subject them to the highest standards in the industry and strive to make each as perfect as possible. We warrant that this product is free of defects in workmanship and materials. This warranty does not cover normal wear and tear, damage caused by misuse, lack of normal maintenance, or disassembly. Remember, anything can break or fail if subject to sufficient abuse. So please do not use this product inappropriately.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Cold Steel - ANYTIME. ANYWHERE. We have all you need from Fixed or Folding Blades, Machetes, ,Axes, Swords, Specialty, and much more! Folding Knives Cold Steel folding, or pocket knives have a reputation throughout the world for being strong, sharp and extremely reliable when put to hard use. Fixed Blades Cold Steel fixed knives, daggers, and blades have a reputation throughout the world for being strong, sharp and extremely reliable when put to hard use. Machetes, Axes, and Tomahawks Cold Steel machetes, or machete knives have a reputation throughout the world for being strong, sharp and extremely durable. Kitchen Series / Specialty The Cold Steel Kitchen Classics series feature high performance ice tempered, cryo-quenched and precision flat ground 400 series steel blades for exceptional cutting performance. All models in the series come with a razor sharp edge that lasts and lasts, and some have serrated edges uniquely appropriate to the tasks they were designed to do

ANYTIME. ANYWHERE Cold Steel is a company dedicated to making the strongest, sharpest knives in the world. Over the last three decades, Cold Steel has been at the forefront of the many innovations that have helped to define the knife industry. Quickly adopted by Military, Law Enforcement Special units, Emergency Services Personnel, Self Defense professionals as well as members of the Martial Arts community, Cold Steel quickly became renowned for quality, strength, reliability and dependability in every day carry (EDC). Cold Steel has introduced pioneering new materials and designs that have helped to shape the world of the modern knife, edged weapons and tools. Our diverse and varied line-up quickly grew to include not only a massive selection of folding knives (from smaller "EDC" blades, to our iconic giant “mega-folders”) but fixed blades, swords, sabers, pole-arms and halberds, as well as hunting gear, spears, blowguns, axes, machetes, tomahawks and tools!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great kitchen utility knife from Cold Steel
reviews.reviewText: I recently acquired a Cold Steel machete based on the Japanese short sword with a tanto style tip, and was duly impressed with the workmanship and sharpness of that tool out of the box. I've been preparing a lot of vegetable based meals for my family, involving red cabbage and root vegetables. The pairing knives I have (both serrated and non-serrated) have not been adequate for the task, so ordered this 6 inch serrated utility knife from Cold Steel, and couldn't happier....it made easy work of a large red cabbage.....just sliced through it like butter. For the money (around $14), I doubt you'll find another kitchen knife that's better for slicing vegetables. The sharp blade and ample handle makes this knife a winner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best knife ever.
reviews.reviewText: I use a utility knife a lot, mostly for chopping vegetables. This is the best knife I've ever owned. It cuts through everything with ease, which is a big blessing for my arthritic hands. I loved it so much that I bought a second one to use when the first one is dirty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sized knife
reviews.reviewText: This is a great knife for the kitchen. Just the right size for sandwiches and vegetable prep. The serrations cut hard crusted bread easily. You will love this knife. Also have a set of cold steel steak knives they are also wickedly sharp and usefull

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good general use kitchen knife
reviews.reviewText: This is a good, general use kitchen knife that you will find becomes one of the “survivors”. That is to say, 15 years from now as you are rummaging through your kitchen/Utility drawer you will find it and it will be one of the few utensils you still have of that age and from that era. It is rugged, sharp and will last. There are 2 reasons I only gave 4 stars. This knife was bought to be a secondary back up to a Cold Steel K7 kitchen knife which I bought about 20 years ago (see what I mean), but the K7 has a 7 inch blade and Cold Steel doesn’t make the K7 anymore so I had to settle for this 6 inch version. My photo compares the two knives. The other reason for the deduction of a star is because the K7 came with a sleeve which the knife has always been stored in, but this 6 inch knife has no sleeve, it is just a loose knife in the drawer. However as to the function, durabilty, ergonomics and value - I would give it 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most versatile knife
reviews.reviewText: This is the most useful knife I've ever had. I use it to cut boxes (it works better than a box cutter,) slippery fruits and vegetables, and to carve pumpkins every Halloween. If you have too many useless knives, then you want this one to replace them. My only complaint is that the blade is on the thin side, so you have to be careful when cutting into tough vegetables like pumpkins or pineapples. If you put too much pressure on the blade, it can bend and slip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I had 2 new kitchen knives that I bought at Walmart that were dull right from the start. I had trouble even slicing tomatoes with them. It wasn't until I read reviews of satisfied buyers of this product, that I decided to give it a try and let me tell you, it is GREAT!! It slices though any food item so easily! In fact, it's very dangerous item to have around so if you do end up purchasing it, make sure it's stored in a safe place away from little hands and fingers. But yes, this is just what I needed for my cooking. I had enough fustration trying to cut with cheap dull knives. This one definetly does the trick. No more heaaches. I totally recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like all Cold Steel blades, this is a very effective kitchen knife!
reviews.reviewText: I had bought a Cold Steel pocket knife, which as been incredible, both in rugged construction, and holding an edge. Based on that, I bought this kitchen knife. The serrated edge cuts veges and everything else very effectively. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cuts like a laser
reviews.reviewText: Cuts tomatoes and soft bread very easily... a true test for a kitchen knife

A very useful and well made utility knife by a well-known knife maker. The company is better known for hunting and survival knives but makes excellent kitchen products. Don't let the utilitarian appearance deceive you -- this is a superb serrated blade that can handle a multitude of kitchen and household tasks. A tough, durable bargain.
Acero 1.4116 con tratamiento criogénico. Excelente elasticidad y retención de filo. Muy buen agarre.
Good strong knife to cut through almost anything. Good quality steel. Not the best looking knife, very simple utilitarian look. Grippy but plain plastic handle.
